api.apiRequestFailed: The interface request failed, please try again later!
api.apiTimeoutMessage: The interface request timed out, please refresh the page and try again!
api.errMsg401: The user does not have permission (token, user name, password error)!
api.errMsg403: The user is authorized, but access is forbidden!
api.errMsg404: Network request error, the resource was not found!
api.errMsg405: Network request error, request method not allowed!
api.errMsg500: Server error, please contact the administrator!
api.errMsg503: The service is unavailable, the server is temporarily overloaded or maintained!
api.errMsg505: The http version does not support the request!
api.errorMessage: The operation failed, the system is abnormal!
api.networkExceptionMsg: Please check if your network connection is normal! The network is abnormal
api.timeoutMessage: Login timed out, please log in again!

portal.overviewPlatformCaption: Daily queries, active users, popular datasets, data quality alerts, export trends
portal.overviewTasksCaption: Access request progress and the status of rules or jobs I created or subscribed to
portal.overviewShortcutsCaption: Start a new query, search datasets, request access
portal.catalogDomainsCaption: Manage enterprise data domains and subject area taxonomy
portal.catalogDatasetsCaption: Search and filter by tags, domain, business terms, and classification
portal.catalogDictionaryCaption: Centralize field dictionary entries and business terms
portal.catalogTagsCaption: Lifecycle management for business and technical tags
portal.catalogClassificationCaption: Public, internal, confidential, and top-secret levels
portal.catalogLineageCaption: Read-only view of upstream sources and downstream targets
portal.catalogQualityCaption: Quality rules and health indicators for the dataset
portal.exploreWorkbenchCaption: SQL and visual queries powered by the platform service
portal.explorePreviewCaption: Automatic row and column trimming with masking by classification
portal.exploreSavedQueriesCaption: Reuse saved queries and curated templates
portal.exploreSharingCaption: Controlled sharing with expiry and scoped visibility
portal.exploreExportCaption: Export requests, approval status, and download history
portal.servicesApiCaption: REST catalog, online testing, and classification-aware views
portal.servicesProxyCaption: Connection strings, allowlists, and least-privilege examples
portal.servicesProductsCaption: Curated wide tables, metric views, and snapshots
portal.servicesTokensCaption: Personal/team access tokens with expiry and scope boundaries
portal.servicesQuotasCaption: Concurrency and throughput controls per user or application
portal.governanceRulesCaption: Null, uniqueness, reference, threshold, and custom SQL checks
portal.governanceTasksCaption: Trends, alerts, and traceability to fields and datasets
portal.governanceMaskingCaption: Column masks and row conditions configurable by level, role, or org
portal.governanceComplianceCaption: PII and sensitive field identification reports
portal.iamClassificationCaption: Map user levels from dts-admin and dataset levels from the catalog
portal.iamAuthorizationCaption: Authorize datasets, fields, and row filters by organization or project
portal.iamSimulationCaption: One-click evaluation of what a user can see for a dataset
portal.iamRequestsCaption: Submit requests routed through dts-admin with in-product tracking
portal.integrationsTdsCaption: Subscribe to TDS outputs and auto-register result tables with classifications
portal.integrationsRdsCaption: Read-only metadata for raw, cleansed, and application zones
portal.integrationsBiCaption: Connect and manage BI platforms centrally
portal.integrationsConnectionsCaption: Create connections per BI workspace or project targeting services or proxies
portal.integrationsIdentityCaption: SSO/token pass-through strategies and least-privilege examples
portal.integrationsCatalogCaption: Optionally harvest BI report lists for audit linkage
portal.integrationsAuditCaption: Ingest BI access logs to unify with platform audit
portal.settingsProfileCaption: Account details, roles, and contact info
portal.settingsNotificationsCaption: Subscribe to alerts, approvals, and job updates
portal.settingsGatewayCaption: Read-only rate limits and allowlists—edit in dts-admin
